name: Shade's Form
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

name: Shambling Swarm
text: When Shambling Swarm dies, distribute three -1/-1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each -1/-1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a -1/-1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

editions.flavor: Chainer's madness personified, it exists only to slaughter the innocent.

text:
As an additional cost to cast Sickening Dreams, discard X cards.

name: Skullscorch

name: Skywing Aven
text:
Flying

editions.flavor: "I am as the wind that bears me: harsh yet gentle, fleeting yet ever-present. Together we fly beyond imagination."
"I am as the wind that bears me: harsh yet gentle, fleeting yet ever-present. Together we fly beyond imagination."

name: Slithery Stalker

Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

When Slithery Stalker leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Sonic Seizure
text:

Sonic Seizure deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

text:
Flying

When Soul Scourge leaves the battlefield, that player gains 3 life.

name: Stern Judge
text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Swamp he or she controls.

text:
